messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] WHo is coming to the conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/2003 2:40:29 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... School s Out Support s Live & Learn Unschooling Conference in Columbia, SC August 22-24,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/2003 2:40:29 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> which conferance

>
>
School's Out Support's Live & Learn Unschooling Conference in Columbia, SC
August 22-24, 2003.

Our presenters include: Mary (Zenmomma, Life is Good) Gold, Pam Sorooshian,
Anne Ohman (she's not here---she's only on the message boards), and Sandra
Dodd, as keynote speaker. Each will be bringing at least one of her children.
Jim Weiss will tell stories and give funshops on storytelling. There will be
magicians, faeries, scientists---tons of neat people sharing what they love.

There will be a raffle of some FABULOUS items---many made by your fellow
unschoolingdotcomedians. There will be a talent show Saturday night.

The conference is non-age-discriminatory---anyone may participate in any
presentation or funshop.

It is a glorious weekend of ONLY veteran unschoolers, new unschoolers, and
wanabee unschoolers. A "must attend"! Fun for the WHOLE family!

Check out the website at http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org/events

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support
mailto:coordinator@...
803-776-4849
Fax: 803-776-7006
http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org
